thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Claire
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Claire

author: Claire
title: Claire
text:
I sold a large number of DVDs and games to CEX online. The process was relatively simple, although a bit long winded. The biggest issue was the website wasn't fully capable on mobile and seemed to time out.
The process of sending the parcel was, again, straight forward. However I felt that communication from CEX could have been improved - other services that I've used have had better communication, for example The price I was paid was significantly lower than Quote: d but I wasn't able to find out why this would be. It wasn't until a few days later that a package from CEX arrived returning some of my DVDs that i understood to price changes.
